<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=1943) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 168 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dragon Disciple](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=56)

**Prerequisites**
ability to cast spells from spell slots; [Dragon Disciple Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1940)

</column>

---

You've discovered how to add the magic of dragons to your tradition. Add the draconic bloodline's granted spells to your spell list; you must still learn them or add them to your repertoire as normal. These spells are [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345), [_resist energy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [_spell immunity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=296), [_chromatic wall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=37), [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=88), [_mask of terror_](/Spells.aspx?ID=185), [_prismatic wall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=234), and [_overwhelming presence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=212).
